CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 29, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "All In Fun - This is the stuff tolerance is made of. By being playmates now, there will be less racial tension as they grow older.  They will be able to speak each other's language, and America will truly be a democracy for which two wars were fought. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children playing on slide on playground of A. Leo Weil School, with Penn Overall Supply in background, Hill District
